page.title: 19H.D.S.A.
page.content: There is a shooting club in Godmanchester called{Huntingdon {District Shooting Association.}It is 25 years old. It has 50 members. You may join when you are 18. They go shooting all the year round. They shoot at{clay pigeons.}Clay pigeons are round. They can be black, orange or white. The white and orange ones are for the evening. To get the clay pigeons from the trap, the man or woman shouts "Pull!" When it is the shooting season they are allowed to shoot real birds like pheasants and grouse. They can shoot pigeons and rats all the year because they are vermin. People have to get a licence before they may own a gun. They mostly use a 12 bore under and over which fires cartridges.
